oai_dc:dc.dc:descriptions: Words and Sentences. Given by 'Jan Plat' (L VII.-1. 6046a-6046c).

Some words and sentences given by Jan Plat at Charlton House in Mowbray. The contribution includes some personal details, such the names of some of his relations. On p.6046c Lloyd notes that Jan Plat and Dia!kwain left Calvinia together.
oai_dc:dc.dc:title: From 'Jan Plat' at Charlton House, Mowbray
